title: Boyfriend of the Girlfriend Who Gives You Vocal Lessons and You Shoot Her to Death

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Shoot who you suspect to be your girlfriend, if they ever gave you vocal lessons, attack them.
- If you use the factional attack on someone who gave you vocal lessons, it becomes powerful and rampaging.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You recieve voice lessons from all your visitors, you learn their role.
- Your first ability can only ever get 2 kills.
